doc:
John Waters (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Waters_(actor) 0 John Russell Waters (born 8 December 1948) is an English-born film, theatre and television actor, singer, guitarist, songwriter and musician best known in Australia, where he moved to in 1968. He is the son of Scottish actor Russell Waters. John Waters has been in the industry for over 40 years, and was part of the Australian children's television series Play School for almost 20 years. John_Russell_Waters ( born_8_December_1948 ) is an_English-born_film_,_theatre_and_television_actor , singer , guitarist , songwriter_and_musician best_known in Australia , where he moved to in_1968 . He is the_son of Scottish_actor_Russell_Waters . John_Waters has_been in the_industry for over_40_years , and was part of the_Australian_children 's_television_series_Play_School for almost_20_years .
